text: Wolf's Fang Runway is a private runway established by White Desert Ltd, a luxury travel company, at Antarctica to provide access for tourist to the company's Whichaway Camp by transiting to Novo Runway. It is a re- establishment of a previous blue ice runway that was known as Blue One runway. Flights operate into/out of the runway during austral summer.Bestfly Antarctica Excursions To Continue This Season ==See also== *Blue ice runway * List of airports in Antarctica ==References== Category:Airports in Antarctica
title: Wolfs Fang Runway
